original_title: 女社長 恥じらいの脱糞8
overview: [Usui Ren, miraculous defecation lifted! !! ] Ren Usui, the female president who manages the company she established with firm conviction and high aspirations. Yamamoto, who doesn't care about such goodwill, betrays her and lets her rival company take over her company. Saeyama, who came as her new president, threatened Ren and gave her defecation training as a secretary.
title: The Female Boss. Shy About Pooping, No. 8. Ren Usui.
